amendment.description: To increase funding for technical assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 4642, previously agreed to, was further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4642 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4642 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S7494-7496) To increase funding for technical assistance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4642 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4642 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Pryor.
